import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import queryString from 'query-string'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../Styles/filter.css'; class Filter extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { locations: [], selectedCityName: '', mealtypeId: 0, mealTypeName: '', }; } componentDidMount() { const qs = queryString.parse(this.props.location.search); const { mealtype, mealTypeName } = qs; this.setState({ mealtypeId: mealtype, mealTypeName: mealTypeName }); const city_id = localStorage.getItem("city_id"); axios.get('http://localhost:5402/api/getLocations') .then(result => { const locations = result.data.locations; const selectedCityName = locations.find(city => city.city_id == city_id); this.setState({ locations: result.data.locations, selectedCityName: selectedCityName.city, }); }) .catch(error => { console.log(error); }); } render() { const { locations, selectedCityName, mealTypeName} = this.state; return ( <>
{mealTypeName} Places in {selectedCityName}

); } } export default withRouter(Filter);
